data.fullContent: Betty is an extremely lazy person. Consequently, her car is a complete mess. Trash litters the floor of her vehicle, and there is dust covering nearly all of the windows. Her home isn't any better: the counters are cluttered with dirty dishes and food covered pans. Who knows the last time she did any laundry.
data.answer: 贝蒂是个极其懒惰的人。因此，她的车完全是一团糟。她的车里到处都是垃圾，几乎所有的窗户上都是灰尘。她家也好不到哪里去：柜台上堆满了脏盘子和带盖的平底锅。谁知道她最后一次洗衣服是什么时候。
